thread.title: Global Opportunity Analysis for Rail Operators 2015
thread.title_full: Global Opportunity Analysis for Rail Operators 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Global Opportunity Analysis for Rail Operators 2015
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Oct. 02 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/r35qqk/opportunity ) has announced the addition of the "Opportunity Analysis for Rail Operators - Growth and Evolution to Newer Businesses " report to their offering.
This market insight provides an outlook of growth opportunities in the rail operator business around the world. The growth of new marketplaces, enabled through increased penetration mobile, is rapidly changing the way customers engage with transport operators. Rail transportation has faced heavy competition from other modes of transportation - primarily from road transport.
The transport market is highly competitive with conventional road transportation providers facing high levels of disruption with further possible dilution of railway modal share. The insight discusses the key trends and opportunities and market forces in the rail operator market; it also highlights competitive factors and key approaches.
Key Topics Covered:
1. Introduction
2. Changes in the Ecosystem for Rail Operations
3. Market for Outsourced Operations to Transport Operators
4. Conclusion
5. References
6. Legal Disclaimer
For more information visit http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/r35qqk/opportunity
Media Contact: Laura Wood , +353-1-481-1716, press@researchandmarkets.net
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/global-opportunity-analysis-for-rail-operators-2015-300153323.html
